name: Shooting Balloons Games 2
description:
This amazing game improve your skills! Practice your shooting skills and become a master! Grab a Shooting Balloons game and shoot to balloons!

How to play:
Tap the screen to shoot. Shoot only to the bad balloons and destroy it!

Game features:
- Six mini games
- 49 levels
- high quality hand painted graphics
- Great gameplay
- Realistic sound
- User friendly interface

Do you like shooting to balloons? Try this game! Shooting Ballons Games is for you!
